title: 32-sai, Kojirase Moteki!?
description: Men are so hard to understand, even as an adult. It's been one year since Ako was dumped by her fiance and her heart is in tatters. Suddenly, she bumps into an ex-boyfriend, but is treated as nothing but a friend with benefits! That's when her cheeky junior coworker at work confesses 'I love you', out of the blue!? "I go with the flow and end up with my coworker (9 years younger than me)..." This surprise confession sets Ako's heart pounding... An adults' love story to sweetly soothe both the heart and body.

matches.title: Make Me Hard: My Boss Won't Let Me Go
Idakarete Tamaru ka! - Rival Douki ga Watashi o Ai de Oitsumeru
Tonari no Seki no Hen na Senpai

Arienai! Do S futago ni kakimazerarechau
